alert.note: Alert for Grady; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 1:21AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grady and northern Stephens Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 121 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marlow, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Duncan, Marlow, Bray and Central High. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
